rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious entrance with foyer leading into a living area that serves as the central gathering spot, aligning with Vastu principles to ensure positivity and energy flow. It includes comfortable seating and display areas.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A dedicated dining room placed in the east for auspicious beginnings, designed with ample natural light for a bright atmosphere.

rooms.name: Industrial Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern industrial kitchen that incorporates stainless steel finishes and state-of-the-art appliances. Designed with practical storage solutions, aligning with the duplex concept where functionality meets luxury.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space situated in a quiet zone near the living area to allow for seamless integration between work and family life. Features soundproofing elements and ample natural light, following Vastu recommendations for intellectual tasks.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated library space offering an extensive collection of books with cozy seating arrangements and designed to encourage contemplation and quiet study. Placed in a corner that adheres to Vastu guidelines for knowledge and creativity.

rooms.name: Guest Suite
rooms.description: A full guest suite with ensuite bathroom, offering comfort and privacy. It is strategically located to maintain an optimal flow as per Indian residential standards.

openings.description: Primary entry aligning with Vastu principles to invite positive energy.
Large windows and skylights for ample natural light and ventilation, ensuring compliance with local building codes.

notes.note: The duplex farmhouse spans a total area of 4000 sqft, with the ground floor serving as the main residential hub while an upper level (not explicitly detailed in this JSON but integral to design) accommodates additional private living quarters and bedrooms.
Design takes into account Indian residential norms, local building codes, and integrates Vastu principles for spatial harmony and energy balance.
